languages.text: {n}Смерив скептическим взглядом плюгавого мирянина, Волк хрипло изрекает:{/n} "Это — ваши пираты? Вижу я удручающее знамение упадка, накрывшего Простор".
{n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."
languages.original_text: {n}Смерив скептическим взглядом плюгавого мирянина, Волк хрипло изрекает:{/n} "Это — ваши пираты? Вижу я удручающее знамение упадка, накрывшего Простор".

traits.locale_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ぽっちゃり体型の素人に懐疑的なまなざしを投げかけて、狼がうなり声を上げる。{/n}「こいつらがお前の海賊だと？エクスパンスの名誉を汚す兆しを目撃するとは、気が滅入る」
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}ぽっちゃり体型の素人に懐疑的なまなざしを投げかけて、狼がうなり声を上げる。{/n}「こいつらがお前の海賊だと？エクスパンスの名誉を汚す兆しを目撃するとは、気が滅入る」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法怀疑地打量着这个胖墩墩的外行人，咆哮起来。{/n}“这些人就是你手下的海盗吗？真让人遗憾，看来整个科罗努斯扩区都堕落了。”
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法怀疑地打量着这个胖墩墩的外行人，咆哮起来。{/n}“这些人就是你手下的海盗吗？真让人遗憾，看来整个科罗努斯扩区都堕落了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Loup lance un regard sceptique au profane potelé, puis dit dans un grognement :{/n}« Ce sont vos pirates ? Quel effroyable témoignage de la dégradation des Étendues. »
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Loup lance un regard sceptique au profane potelé, puis dit dans un grognement :{/n}« Ce sont vos pirates ? Quel effroyable témoignage de la dégradation des Étendues. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras lanzar una mirada escéptica al laico más rechoncho, el Lobo gruñe:{/n} «¿Estos son sus piratas? Veo que la Extensión ha caído presa del deterioro».
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras lanzar una mirada escéptica al laico más rechoncho, el Lobo gruñe:{/n} «¿Estos son sus piratas? Veo que la Extensión ha caído presa del deterioro».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einem skeptischen Blick auf den plumpen Laien knurrt der Wolf:{/n} "Sind das Eure Piraten? Ich sehe ein entmutigendes Zeichen des Verfalls der in der Ausdehnung Einzug gehalten hat."
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem skeptischen Blick auf den plumpen Laien knurrt der Wolf:{/n} "Sind das Eure Piraten? Ich sehe ein entmutigendes Zeichen des Verfalls der in der Ausdehnung Einzug gehalten hat."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tombul işsizlere kuşkulu bir bakış atan Kurt, hırlıyor.{/n} "Senin korsanlar şunlar mı? Enginlik'ten umudumu kesen türden bir bozulma görüyorum sadece."
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sceptical look at the plump layman, the Wolf growls,{/n} "Are these your pirates? I see a dispiriting sign of the degradation that has overtaken the Expanse."
